data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. Davide ná-kidafaawui.
Siɛgi zu Edɔme nui Dowɛge liini la, é ɠɛ Sayile ma, Davide liiʋɛ Ayimelɛke ná-pɛlɛi wu.
Ɗɛi è zuɓaai, leeni vaa zu è wasosu ɗa-zuɲɔi zu?
Yaavai nɔ ɠa è-nɛgi kpɛtɛzu, kpeka ɠaaligi,
Faa ɲɔi nɛɛʋɛ è ʋɛ, é leʋe faa ʋagɔi ʋa,
Nu ɠoloɠolo gooiti nɛɛʋɛ è ʋɛ,
Naa ɠa é ba, GALA ka è lokasu eyɛsu ɠɔ.
Telebo nuiti ta naa ɠa, dualuagi ti zo,
«Wɛlɛ zunui ʋa, nii é la ɠɛni GALA kɛɛni ga makɛ nui,
Nɔ̀un nà, nà GALA ná-pɛlɛi wu eɠɛ wolive wului ma wundui,
Nà è maamusɛ eyɛsu ɠɔ, è-ɠɛɛ vai ʋɔ, nii è kɛai.
